caption.p: Expression of specific transcription factors and cytokines for Th cell subsets in the heart on d 7 and 14 ( n = 6 per group). (a) and (b) denote protein expression of the cytokines of Th cell subsets by Western blot analysis. (c) and (d) denote protein expression of the specific transcription factors of Th cell subsets by Western blot analysis. C. Expression levels of specific transcription factors mRNA for Th cell subsets by qPCR analysis. Data are expressed as means ± SD. * p< 0.05 vs. VMC group. # p< 0.05 vs. VMC+Sham group. + p< 0.05 vs. VMC+Vag group. & p< 0.05 vs. VMC+V+P group
